net.sf.microlog
Interface Appender

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAppender, ConsoleAppender, FileAppender, FormAppender, RecordStoreAppender
public interface Appender

The interface that all Appender classes must implement.

Author:
Johan Karlsson (johan.karlsson@jayway.se)

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

doLog

void doLog(Level level,
           java.lang.Object message,
           java.lang.Throwable t)
Do the logging.

Parameters:
level - the logging level
message - the message to log.
t - the exception to log.

clearLog

void clearLog()
Clear the log.

closeLog

void closeLog()
Close the log. The consequence is that the logging is disabled until the log is opened. The logging could be enabled by calling openLog().

openLog

void openLog()
             throws MicroLogException
Open the log. The consequence is that the logging is enabled.

Throws:
MicroLogException - when some internal exception has occurred.

getLogSize

long getLogSize()
Get the size of the log. This may not be applicable to all types of appenders.

Returns:
the size of the log.

setFormatter

void setFormatter(Formatter formatter)
Set the formatter to use.

Parameters:
formatter - The formatter to set.

getFormatter

Formatter getFormatter()
Get the formatter that is in use.

Returns:
Returns the formatter.

configure

void configure(PropertiesGetter properties)
Configure the appender.

Parameters:
properties - Properties to configure with
